thread.title: Former Pharmaceutical Executive Martin Shkreli Set to Learn Fate Friday

author: Rebecca Davis O’Brien
title: Former Pharmaceutical Executive Martin Shkreli Set to Learn Fate Friday
text:
Former pharmaceutical executive Martin Shkreli is set to be sentenced Friday on federal securities-fraud charges, in a hearing that will likely be a referendum on Mr. Shkreli’s public persona as well as his criminal conduct.
Federal prosecutors in Brooklyn are seeking a prison term of at least 15 years for Mr. Shkreli, citing the breadth of his frauds and a history of public disrespect for law enforcement. His lawyers have asked the judge for a sentence of 12 to 18 months, plus community service.
